means: 拒绝，回绝( refuse的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: I was often rude and ungracious in refusing help.
sentence.Network_cn: 我拒绝接受帮助的时候时常显得粗鲁无礼。

sentence.Network_en: They are sitting on the fence and refusing to commit themselves.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们保持中立，拒绝表态。

sentence.Network_en: She had effectively shut him out by refusing to listen.
sentence.Network_cn: 她拒不听他说话，并以此有效地将他排除在外。

PerfectNetExp.abs: the reason he gave for not refusing himself was that there were was no financial gain for him in making his decision .他为不回避行为给出的理由是他不没有从作出决定的行为中得到财务性收益。
He grumbled out his reasons for refusing the command ., 他生气地说出拒绝执行该项命令的理由.
on this account i am refusing his offer ., 由于这个缘故 , 我不能接受你的建议.
You are in the right in refusing to give in to them ., 你对他们坚决不肯让步 , 是对的.

list.abs: 消防专业词汇英语翻译(P-Z) ... refuse destructor 垃圾焚化炉 refuse disposal 垃圾处置 refuse incineration 垃圾焚化.
埃克钛环保科技 ... 水处理 Water Treatment 垃圾处理 Refuse Treatment 水情监测 Hydrology Monitoring.
refuse silk 乱丝refuse wagon 垃圾车refuse yarn 废纱
refuse destructor 垃圾焚化炉refuse incinerator 垃圾焚化炉refuse receptacle 垃圾桶

entry.def: If you refuse to do something, you deliberately do not do it, or you say firmly that you will not do it.

example.ex: He refused to comment after the trial...
example.tran: 庭审之后他拒绝作出评论。

example.ex: He expects me to stay on here and I can hardly refuse.
example.tran: 他希望我继续留在这里，我很难拒绝。

entry.def: If someone refuses you something, they do not give it to you or do not allow you to have it.

example.ex: The United States has refused him a visa...
example.tran: 美国拒绝给他发放签证。

example.ex: She was refused access to her children...
example.tran: 她被禁止探视她的孩子。

entry.def: If you refuse something that is offered to you, you do not accept it.

example.ex: He offered me a second drink which I refused...
example.tran: 他请我再喝一杯，我没有接受。

example.ex: The patient has the right to refuse treatment.
example.tran: 病人有权利拒绝接受治疗。

entry.tran: 废物，垃圾（主要用于官方语言）
entry.def: Refuse consists of the rubbish and all the things that are not wanted in a house, shop, or factory, and that are regularly thrown away; used mainly in official language.

example.ex: The District Council made a weekly collection of refuse.
example.tran: 区政务委员会每周收取一次垃圾。

auth_sentence.content: In some areas they are refusing to take part.
auth_sentence.res_content: In some areas they are refusing to take part.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In some areas they are refusing to take part.

auth_sentence.content: Then she left abruptly after refusing to answer questions.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then she left abruptly after refusing to answer questions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then she left abruptly after refusing to answer questions.

auth_sentence.content: My right hand is still refusing to forgive me.
auth_sentence.res_content: My right hand is still refusing to forgive me.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My right hand is still refusing to forgive me.

Sentence.sentence: An X-rays technician is refusing to do her job until the firm agrees to replace its out-dated equipment.
